geneious.plugin
Class PasswordOption

java.lang.Object
  com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.Options.Option<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JPasswordField>
      geneious.plugin.PasswordOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.XMLSerializable
public class PasswordOption
extends com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.Options.Option<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JPasswordField>

Example password option that does not store the value in preferences. This lets us avoid making the decision between:

  1. Storing an obfuscated password that can easily be decrypted.
  2. Storing a plain text password so people know things are not secure.
  3. Trying to integrate with an external password store that requires unlocking i.e. Mac OS X keychain.

Version:
$Id: PasswordOption.java 73 2013-12-05 01:14:12Z matthew@biomatters.com $

Created on 5/12/13 12:53 PM

Matthew Cheung
